articles.title: 5 things to know about Dolphins before Patriots take them on in Week 2
articles.description:
The Patriots are looking to snap their five-game losing streak to the Dolphins in Miami.

The post 5 things to know about Dolphins before Patriots take them on in Week 2 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots aim to end five-game losing streak against Dolphins on September 17.
Dolphins have a strong home advantage, impacting Patriots' chances in Miami.
Local fans anticipate a competitive game that could shift team momentum.

articles.title: Review & setlist: Ethel Cain haunts Roadrunner with Southern Gothic epic
articles.description:
"Willoughby Tucker, I’ll Always Love You" takes center stage in a night of haunting beauty and raw emotion.

The post Review & setlist: Ethel Cain haunts Roadrunner with Southern Gothic epic appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ethel Cain performed at Roadrunner on September 13, captivating Boston audiences with her Southern Gothic style.
The setlist featured the emotional centerpiece 'Willoughby Tucker, I’ll Always Love You'.
Local residents experienced a night of haunting beauty and raw emotion, enhancing Boston's cultural scene.

articles.title: 45 years later, Andover High’s Chiklis returns to gridiron for ‘The Senior’
articles.description:
Ahead of a Boston screening Sunday, the Lowell Native talks Tom Brady, Boston University — and getting pummeled on the field.

The post 45 years later, Andover High’s Chiklis returns to gridiron for ‘The Senior’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Actor Michael Chiklis returns to football for 'The Senior' screening in Boston on Sunday.
Chiklis, a Lowell native, reflects on his high school football days and Tom Brady.
The event highlights local talent and connects Boston residents to their sports heritage.
